issue.title: [C++][Documentation] Update overview of Arrow components/layers
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14729](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14729). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
New components have been added/modified in Arrow (e.g., query engine), so we should update documentation that describes these. Overview of Arrow layers are described in [overview.rst](https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/docs/source/cpp/overview.rst).
